sentence: Harper, 38, shot back: “What we don’t need to happen is have Josh Mandel talk for the Black community.” At one point, Mandel called Harper a “looney Nancy Pelosi” for “advocating for all this green energy” when Harper pledged to support renewable energy to help mitigate climate change.
author: Liz Skalka
title: A Hard-Right Republican And A Progressive Debated. It Went As Well As You'd Expect.

sentence: During the fiery hour-and-a-half event between Republican Josh Mandel and Democrat Morgan Harper, Mandel repeatedly attacked Ryan for failing to debate Harper so far and portrayed it as fundamental disrespect among state Democrats for their Black voter base.
author: JULIE CARR SMYTH
title: Tim Ryan, not onstage, is early focus of Ohio Senate event

sentence: During the fiery hour-and-a-half event between Republican Josh Mandel and Democrat Morgan Harper, Mandel repeatedly attacked Ryan for failing to debate Harper so far and portrayed it as fundamental disrespect among state Democrats for their Black voter base.

title: Tim Ryan, not onstage, is early focus of Ohio Senate event

sentence: His departure from the race could allow others to consolidate support as former state treasurer Josh Mandel has been an early frontrunner.
author: Andrew J. Tobias
title: Bernie Moreno drops out of Ohio’s Republican U.S. Senate race

sentence: "He doesn't have the temperament, experience, or fortitude to be a US Senator and Ohio voters got a first-hand look at just how unprepared Josh Mandel has become and that will be reflected on the ballot on May 3," she added.
author: Kelsey Vlamis
title: 2 GOP frontrunners in the Ohio Senate race squared off during a heated debate moment: 'You watch what happens'

sentence: Career politician Josh Mandel called investment banker Mike Gibbons a “p---y” under his breath at the end of the heated exchange.
author: Joseph Wilkinson
title: Republican Ohio Senate candidate calls opponent ‘p---y’ in near-altercation at debate

sentence: He doesn’t have the temperament, experience, or fortitude to be a U.S. senator and Ohio voters got a firsthand look at just how unprepared Josh Mandel is to be a leader and that will be reflected at the ballot on May 3.” Meanwhile, Mandel’s campaign manager said Gibbons “got upset tonight that he was called out for his investments in Chinese oil.” “He claims not to remember the investment, but it’s part of a pattern of Gibbons’ entire career making money by taking American companies and selling them to foreign interests,” campaign manager Scott Guthrie said.
author: Brittany Bernstein
title: Ohio GOP Senate Candidates Have Heated Face-to-Face Exchange during Debate

sentence: “We all volunteered to serve our country away from our families, putting our lives in danger, so people like Mike Gibbons could make millions.” Gibbons said Mandel initiated the physical aggression and made “several false, petty comments in an attempt to smear the new front-runner.” “Josh Mandel is unhinged, unfit and flailing — because he’s losing,” Gibbons campaign spokesperson Samantha Cotten said.
author: AP and TOI staff
title: Near-fight at Ohio GOP Senate debate between candidates Josh Mandel, Mike Gibbons

sentence: The debate became intense almost as soon as it began as former state Treasurer Josh Mandel attacked investment banker Mike Gibbons’ business dealings.
author: Associated Press
title: Fight at Ohio GOP Senate debate elevates military issue

sentence: Ohio GOP Senate candidates Josh Mandel and Mike Gibbons, who made headlines over the weekend after squaring off toe-to-toe during a party debate near Columbus, did not appear ready to back down during interviews on Newsmax Monday.
author: Sandy Fitzgerald
title: Ohio's Mandel, Gibbons to Newsmax: Not Backing Down After Debate Fight

sentence: "I want to say it very clearly for all of the RINOs out there and all of the media elites out there the 2020 election was stolen from Donald J. Trump," candidate Josh Mandel said.

title: Ohio's 7 Republican Senate hopefuls face off in debate at Central State University

sentence: Vance has been locked in a heated race against former state treasurer Josh Mandel, investment banker Mike Gibbons, former Ohio Republican Party chair Jane Timken, and state Sen. Matt Dolan, whose family owns the Cleveland Guardians.
author: Associated Press
title: Trump backs GOP’s JD Vance in US Senate primary in Ohio

sentence: The decision marks a major blow for Vance's top rivals — former state treasurer Josh Mandel, investment banker Mike Gibbons and former Ohio Republican Party chair Jane Timken — who have been locked in a heated and contentious race for both the nomination and Trump's backing in a primary that is now less than three weeks away.
author: JILL COLVIN and JULIE CARR SMYTH
title: Trump backs GOP’s JD Vance in US Senate primary in Ohio
